title: [FSX/P3D] Sonic Solutions - Twin Otter Sound Pack V2
description:
Sonic Solutions' Twin Otter Sound Pack V2. Although this can be used with any aircraft in FSX/P3D/P3D v2, it is an especially good match for those that have Pratt & Whitney Canada PT6A engines installed on them. Please note that this package does NOT have gear up/gear down sounds as Twin Otter has a fixed landing gear rather than a retractable one. If you need those sounds when using this package with another aircraft, you will have to add them manually by yourself. While this is generally a very good sound package, there are a few sounds that I don't like, but I decided to leave them untouched to present the package to you pirates as is.


INSTALLATION:

Simple. Open the compressed 7z file, extract ALL its content into an empty folder on your computer and read the installation instructions provided to complete the installation.

Seed and enjoy, pirates!
